about: The 'Stay True' film by Ballantine challenges traditional notions of power and success. In a world where influence no longer resides solely in corner offices or towering skyscrapers, the new leaders of wealth and talent are disruptors of stereotypes. Driven by inner conviction, these individuals are fearless, bold, and unshaken by setbacks. Their strength lies in their uniqueness, and they embody the spirit of a new corporate tribe. The film showcases a diverse array of protagonists, each representing success in unconventional and unexpected walks of life — a true celebration of staying true to one's own path.
subtitle: Stay True

about: The Beefeater Gin Tonic Water film celebrates the vibrant energy and contrasting dynamics of London city life. Capturing the essence and quirky vibe of urban living, the film is an ode to the creative spirit of Beefeater's target audience — those who thrive on the unexpected and embrace a free-spirited, adventurous mindset. A tribute to the bold, the unconventional, and the spirited individuals who bring the city to life.
subtitle: Love the Red
pagination_text: Pagination / Motion / Beefeater Love the Red

about: Oaken Glow Smokey Whisky's product film was created during the lockdown in a unique and innovative way, with the client connecting via Zoom. Despite the challenges, the passionate director and DOP captured the essence of the whisky through an intimate product shot. After wrapping up, they continued to push creative boundaries, working with models to craft their own phenomenal brand film. The result is a stunning showcase of Oaken Glow's bold and smoky character, born out of passion, resilience, and creativity.

In the heart of Madrid, the SUZUKI FRONX drives through the vibrant streets, catching the eyes of stylish individuals. From a girl on the go to a young couple at a café, everyone who spots the car instantly connects with its energy—vibing together with a stylish hook step. The commercial highlights how the FRONX brings people together, radiating confidence and style, all while showcasing its bold, dynamic presence.
subtitle: Minds Alike, Vibe Together

about: In this groundbreaking commercial, Suzuki Dzire's sharp styling is brought to life through a unique visual metaphor, sculpting a marble slab as the car drives around it. The abstract, surreal, and stylized environment enhances the car's sleek design, showcasing its cutting-edge features. This project marks a major milestone as the first Indian company to shoot at one of the world's top virtual production studios in Germany. Using Unreal Engine and advanced real-time rendering technology, the commercial blends virtual and live-action elements to create immersive, high-tech environments without traditional location shoots.
subtitle: Sharp Styling

about: BPFT 25 partnered with renowned designer Akshat Bloni to create a series of premium promo films, capturing the essence of fashion, luxury, and timeless style. These films were crafted to showcase Bloni's signature blend of contemporary elegance and cutting-edge design, perfectly suited for the BPFT 25 Tour across four cities in India. With a focus on high-end fashion and premium content, each film embodies the sophisticated allure of luxury, tailored to an audience with a refined taste for style.

The BALENO commercial showcases a couple living a multidimensional, versatile life, where every moment leads to the next in an unending loop of activities. From one event to another, the film highlights how the Baleno fits seamlessly into their busy, dynamic routine. With its adaptability and versatility, the Baleno empowers them to do whatever they want, no matter how packed or unpredictable their day gets.
subtitle: Up for Anything

about: The TATA Punch commercial made history as the first-ever shoot in Kargil, India. The team faced numerous challenges, from monsoons and harsh weather to difficult accessibility. Despite the tough conditions, the breathtaking landscapes and the car's resilience made every obstacle worthwhile. The film's tagline, “Every journey brings its own questions. You bring your own reply.”, encapsulates the spirit of the Tata Punch, inviting adventurers to “Find your vibe. Vibes with you.”
subtitle: TATA PUNCH - Kargil Commercial

about: Chivas 18 has partnered with designer Sussanne Khan to create a limited-edition pack, inspired by the rich, opulent, and exotic essence of the scotch. Crafted from 85 carefully selected botanicals, Chivas 18 is one of the most unique and luxurious blends, with each sip revealing new layers of flavor. The film accompanying the launch is a surreal, sensory journey that invites viewers into a mesmerizing world of visual and sensory wonder. It draws you deeper into a treasure trove of endless, swirling worlds—both within the spirit itself and within Suzanne Khan's creative imagination. The two realms beautifully merge, offering a visual feast that encapsulates the breathtaking and bewitching essence of Chivas 18.

The collaboration between Biotique and actress Sara Ali Khan features a series of four films, each highlighting a different product from the brand. Leveraging Sara's unique ability to weave rhymes into her performances, each film showcases the products in an engaging, playful, and memorable way, perfectly capturing the essence of Biotique's natural and effective beauty solutions.

A heartwarming film that captures the evolving dynamics of trust between a father and daughter in a digital age. When the daughter decides to take a solo road trip through the hills in her red Swift, her father is understandably hesitant. But what puts him at ease is the Suzuki Connect app, which lets him stay connected to her journey  from vehicle health and live tracking to safety alerts.The film seamlessly blends emotion and technology, showing how peace of mind and independence can go hand in hand. Small hiccups on the road become non-events, thanks to the app's timely updates and safety features.
pagination_text: Pagination / Motion / Suzuki Swift Solo Trip

about: A film that journeys through India's rich, diverse and deeply personal relationship with tea. Shot across the country, The Tea Society of India captures intimate human moments from bustling city corners to quiet village homes where chai is more than just a drink, it's a ritual, a pause, a conversation starter, and sometimes, even a silent companion. This evocative visual collection celebrates India's proudly home-grown tea-drinking culture, revealing how a simple cup of chai connects people across languages, landscapes, and lifestyles.

"Haath Badhao" is an evocative brand film created for Vivo India about the COVID-19 lockdown, highlighting the quiet courage and everyday heroism of ordinary Indians. The film captures vignettes of hope, compassion, and resilience during one of the most difficult times in recent history. 

 From frontline workers and delivery agents to doctors, shopkeepers, and neighbours- the film celebrates helping hands that never stopped, no matter the hour or the hardship. It reminds us that you don’t need influence or wealth to make a difference -just intent and heart.
 The Vivo phone becomes an enabler of these small, powerful acts — connecting people, offering help, spreading joy, and giving hope.
subtitle: Haath Badhao

about:
A cinematic homage to craftsmanship, this film positions Kingfisher Ultra Max not just as a beer, but as a work of art. The narrative draws parallels between brewing and performance — where only the finest malts audition, and just four make the cut. Each grain is roasted to perfection, brewed with precision, and filtered six times to achieve its signature golden clarity. 

 Through elegant visuals and poetic narration, the campaign celebrates Kingfisher Ultra Max as the ultimate expression of taste, strength, and refinement — setting the benchmark for what it truly means to be "The Gold Standard Beer."
subtitle: Haath Badhao
